content: 2 on either side of cast on left mitt k to m sm m1r k to m m1l sm k1 position bor in the middle of these 7 stitches with right mitt k to m sm m1r k to m m1l sm 3 stitches to left of the marker and four to the right k to bor 22 stitches knit round round 1 k to bor both mitts k to bor round 2 k2 k2tog k to last 4 stitches ssk k2 20 stitches round 1 set up round round 2 increase round round 3 k to bor round 3 knit round round 4 k1 k2tog k to last 3 stitches ssk k1 repeat rounds 2-3 until there are 9 stitches 18 stitches between markers round 5 k to bor round 4 knit round cut mc round 5 knit round round 6 with cc k to bor round 6 increase round round 7-11 k1 p1 rib repeat rounds 4-6 until there are 15 stitches cast off with an elastic bind off between markers weave in ends and enjoy your new solstice mitts rounds 7-11 knit round www fancytigercrafts com 3 © fancy tiger crafts 2022 solstice mitts solstice mitts charts charts are provided in both a standard and inverted style standard charts are written with a darker contrast color than the main color inverted charts are written with a lighter contrast color than main color please choose the set of charts that corresponds to your individual color choices and that are easiest for you to read charts chart a chart b inverted charts chart a chart b www fancytigercrafts com 4 © fancy tiger crafts 2022
